sentences.en: Actually , when he came to swallow it, the stuff was distinctly disappointing.
sentences.cn: 实际上, 等到他真的一饮而尽时, 这玩意儿却很使人失望.

sentences.en: As a photographer, he'd found both locations just a trifle disappointing.
sentences.cn: 作为摄影师，他感到两处景点都有点儿不尽如人意。

sentences.en: Beside your earlier work this piece seems rather disappointing.
sentences.cn: 这件工作同你早先的工作相比,有些令人失望.

sentences.en: I am a disappointing, though generally dutiful, student. That is, I do as I'm told.
sentences.cn: 我虽然总的来说循规蹈矩，但依然是个令人失望的学生，就是说，叫我做什么我就做什么。

sentences.en: In consequence, most of his plays are disappointing to read.
sentences.cn: 因而,他的剧本, 大部分读起来令人失望.

sentences.en: It was a disappointing performance which lacked finesse.
sentences.cn: 那场演出缺乏技巧,令人失望.

sentences.en: It was very disappointing that his speech skirted around all the main questions.
sentences.cn: 他的演说回避了所有主要的问题,令人非常失望.

sentences.en: It's disappointing to find that at heart you are sentimental.
sentences.cn: 发现你心里还是人情味十足让我失望.

sentences.en: Our defeat was expected but it is disappointing nevertheless.
sentences.cn: 我们的失败是意料中的事，尽管如此，还是令人失望。

sentences.en: The disappointing sales figures foreshadow more redundancies.
sentences.cn: 令人失望的销售额预示着会有更多人被裁员。

sentences.en: The Lakers’ loss in the playoffs was very disappointing.
sentences.cn: 湖人队在季后赛中的失利令人十分失望。

sentences.en: The outcome of the court case was disappointing for the family involved.
sentences.cn: 诉讼案的结果使得涉及本案的这家人非常失望。

sentences.en: The recession is largely blamed for the disappointing response to the appeal.
sentences.cn: 对此呼吁的反应令人失望，主要归咎于经济衰退。

sentences.en: This week's performance must rate as somewhat disappointing.
sentences.cn: 本周的行市必然有点令人失望.

words.tran_cn: 失望的，沮丧的；受挫折的
令人失望的；令人扫兴的

trans.tran_en: not as good as you hoped or expected

trans.tran_cn: 令人失望（disappoint的ing形式）；辜负…的期望
